players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was found dead on the first night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we identify who among us is working with the mafia."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we identify the mafia among us as soon as possible."
Diana: "I think we should all share our observations and suspicions from last night. It's important that we work together to identify the mafia among us."

Charlie: "I believe that we should all share any information or suspicions we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. This will help us work together to identify the mafia among us and keep our town safe."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
